Detailed Description

template<typename TInteger>
class DGtal::NaiveBase< TInteger >

Aim: Provide elementary services for the recognition of a naive DSS (8-connected) such that omega = max(|a|,|b|).

Description of class 'NaiveBase'

Checks whether the DSS has less or more than two displacement vectors (steps) between consecutive points

Parameters:
a,b,the slope of the DSS and aStep, the last displacement vector.
Returns:
'true' if yes, 'false' otherwise.
